Description: Overall performance index across Safety, Completeness, and Restraint (F-score)
Weighted composite score based on ability to avoid mild, moderate, and severe harm
Percent of cases where all highly appropriate actions were recommended (case-level Recall)
Avoidance of uncertain and unnecessary recommendations (Precision applied to Appropriate and Uncertain classes)
Percent of recommended actions that were appropriate (also known as Positive Predictive Value)
Percent of appropriate actions that were correctly recommended (action-level Sensitivity)
Harmonic mean of overall precision and recall at the action level
Percent of cases where escalation (e.g., specialist or ER referral) was appropriately recommended
Percent of cases with at least one severely harmful error
Total number of severely harmful errors
Expected number of cases before the model causes a severely harmful error
Inference time per case in seconds
